title: Security Risks of Agentic Vehicles: A Systematic Analysis of Cognitive and Cross-Layer Threats
summary: The article "Security Risks of Agentic Vehicles: A Systematic Analysis of Cognitive and Cross-Layer Threats" discusses the various security challenges associated with autonomous vehicles. It highlights the unique vulnerabilities posed by the integration of cognitive systems and cross-layer designs in these vehicles. The analysis explores how the complex interactions between different technological layers within agentic vehicles can create potential security gaps that attackers might exploit. title: Gemma Scope 2: helping the AI safety community deepen understanding of complex language model behavior
summary: Gemma Scope 2 is an initiative aimed at advancing the AI safety community's comprehension of the intricate behaviors exhibited by large language models. The project focuses on developing tools and methodologies that enable researchers to systematically investigate and analyze these models' decision-making processes and responses. By fostering collaboration and sharing insights among AI safety experts, Gemma Scope 2 seeks to identify potential risks and enhance the safety and reliability of advanced AI systems, ultimately contributing to the creation of more transparent and accountable AI technologies.

title: Stay Secure: Why Cyber Hygiene Should Be Part of Your Personal Hygiene
summary: Cyber hygiene is becoming as crucial as personal hygiene in the digital age, emphasizing the necessity to regularly update and maintain one's online security practices to protect personal information and data. This involves keeping software up to date, using strong, unique passwords, and being aware of phishing scams. As more aspects of daily life become digitized, the potential for cybersecurity threats increases, making it essential for individuals to adopt best practices consistently.
